articles.title: India vs Qatar Highlights, FIFA World Cup 2022 Qualifier: 10-man India Lose 1-0 to Qatar - News18
articles.description: India vs Qatar Highlights, FIFA World Cup 2022 Qualifier: 10-man India go down 1-0 against Qatar in the 2022 FIFA World Cup and 2023 AFC Asian Cup qualifier. India 0-1 Qatar.
articles.content:
There is a huge difference in both the quality and rankings of the two teams. While Qatar are ranked 58th, India are 105th.

articles.title: Actor Simu Liu calls out Kim's Convenience producers in candid Facebook post - CBC.ca
articles.description: Kim's Convenience actor Simu Liu criticized the show's 'overwhelmingly white' producers for discounting input from Asian cast members, revealed that the actors were paid at an 'absolute horsepoop rate' and that showrunners were 'epically reclusive.'
articles.content: Actor Simu Liu, who was an integral part of CBC's award-winning comedy Kim's Convenience, took to Facebook on Wednesday with a candid post detailing the workplace culture during his time on the show.… [+5419 chars]

articles.title: Philippines, other Asian nations to share 7M vaccine doses from US’ first batch of donations - GMA News
articles.description: The Philippines is one of the priority nations in Asia that will share 7 million doses from the first tranche of COVID-19 vaccines the United States will donate globally, US President Joe Biden announced Thursday.
